alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 9:57AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF THE FLAT TOPS AND CENTRAL YAMPA RIVER BASIN COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of 30 TO 35 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 955 AM MST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Hayden to 17 miles south of Craig to 14 miles north of Meeker and moving southeast at 15 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Axial and Loyd. This includes Colorado 13 between mile markers 57 and 63. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops
